Name: Ridiculousness
Title: Sterling and Lolo Wood LXXXVI
Desc: Rob, Steelo and guest host Lolo Wood get a double shot of agony and meet some mean mutts.
LongDescription: Rob, Steelo and guest host Lolo Wood get a double shot of agony with "Pain Echoes"; meeting some mean mutts that are "Kid Hatin' Canines"; getting flicked off with some "Random Birds."
